definitions.definition: Rule by the people, especially as a form of government ; either directly or through elected representatives ( representative democracy ).
A government under the direct or representative rule of the people of its jurisdiction .
A state with a democratic system of government .
Belief in political freedom and equality; the "spirit of democracy".

main_definition: ( uncountable ) Rule by the people, especially as a form of government ; either directly or through elected representatives ( representative democracy ).
secondary_definitions: ( countable , government ) A government under the direct or representative rule of the people of its jurisdiction .
( countable ) A state with a democratic system of government .
( uncountable ) Belief in political freedom and equality; the "spirit of democracy".
